A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst movie I've ever seen. Disney and Co took everything I loved and grew up with as a kid and threw it in the paper shredder. Enormous plot holes and they turned my favorite character into a whiny Hillary Clinton. Get your capes ready because apparently people can unconsciously fly like Superman too. I have nothing against hiring ethnically diverse cast as long as the characters are interesting and the actors are competent\, but Rose and Finn are horrid. Same with that DJ idiot lisp
